String.Content:
For untold generations, my people have lived deep within the earth, surrounded by #cg#verdant subterranean forests#ec#, #cc#sparkling waters#ec#, and #cy#crystalline luminance#ec#.
We all have a special connection to this world, a bond with nature we call #cy#the Touch#ec#.

Some are born with an abundance of #cy#Touch#ec#, which fills them with a sense of #cy#adventure#ec#; an urge to explore the #cc#wilds#ec# beyond our #cg#Home#ec#.
All with the #cy#Touch#ec# inherit the appearance of animals.

And sometimes, when we fully experience the #cy#Touch#ec#, we are drawn to #cg#Tangledeep#ec#...
An ever-changing labyrinth that leads #cy#upward#ec# to a world that #cy#no one has ever seen#ec#.

I have never felt the #cy#Touch#ec#, unlike many others in my home of #cy#Riverstone Camp#ec#. Yet there is so much I want to learn about #cg#Tangledeep#ec#...
Today, I have decided: #cy#I will go there#ec# and find my own answers.
They say people like me belong in the wilds. So what if I don't play by the rules? I know right from wrong. I'll go where I want, I always have. Today, I'm going to get rich!

I've been waiting to get out here for so long! I can hear them, all of them, singing, laughing, sharing stories. Tangledeep is so noisy and alive! Today, I'm going to make new friends, and they'll tell me everything.
Every step is measured, every cut long planned, And my enemies lost ten moves ago. Life is balance, grace, and motion. Today, all the pieces fall into place.
The length of all my training, the depth of my research. This is the work that defines me. The world is square, but there are endless angles inside. Today, I will be measured against the unknown.
I have never doubted that Faith is Strength. My home, my people, they mean so much to me. But I have a duty and I have been chosen. Today, I will answer the call.
Rain drops are soft, yet, Who can withstand the typhoon? I'm both calm and storm. Today, I will finally know myself.
Tangledeep is nature's bounty. It's a gift. I am ever thankful. Nature is my life and breath. But I'm tired of thieves, bandits, and villains dirtying my air. Today, I'm gonna clean up this mess.
Tossing the dice and spinning the wheel, I'm ready for the big score, and Tangledeep's got it. I make the smart bets and there's no one luckier, but Today might be my last!
I serve no master, but I was built, not born. No one knows anything, least of all me! Even though I've always felt welcomed by home and family, Tomorrow is where I belong.
Some live in the present; others, the future. But I am interested in the echoes of yesterday. There are so many memories of this world. Today, I will find who they belong to.

I grew up listening to tales of legendary heroes. I learned that glory comes only through adversity. In my odyssey into Tangledeep, I will overcome every challenge. Today, I will sing the songs of my own adventure!
The ways of civilization are so foreign. Why do people restrain themselves from the Touch's embrace? I prefer the company of monsters. Today, I will conquer the place of my birth!
#cg#YUM!#ec# #cy#^tag1^#ec# loved the delicious #cy#^tag2^#ec# and wants more!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# goes absolutely wild and devours the #cy#^tag2^#ec#! They look #cg#happier and more beautiful#ec#!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# has outgrown the taste of #cy#^tag2^#ec#! Try #cg#another food instead#ec#.
#cy#^tag1^#ec# loves being fed! Their #cg#happiness level#ec# is now ^tag2^.
#cy#Brush brush... clip clip...#ec# #cy#^tag1^#ec# loves the attention! They #cg#look better now#ec#, too!
#cy#Bath Time!#ec# #cc#Scrub scrub...#ec# #cy#^tag1^#ec# doesn't like baths, but they #cg#look much better now#ec#!

#co#Heroic Mode#ec# If you reach 0 HP, the game ends (#cr#permadeath#ec#). Only banked goods and town progress will be saved. This is #co#challenging#ec#, but also #cy#the intended way to experience Tangledeep#ec#!
#cg#Adventure Mode#ec# If you reach 0 HP, you will #cg#return to town#ec#. You will lose half of: your money, unspent JP, and XP progress. Recommended for #cg#roguelike beginners#ec#.

#cr#Hardcore Mode#ec# If you reach 0 HP, the game ends (#cr#permadeath#ec#). All traces of your adventure are permanently #cr#erased#ec#. #cy#Previous meta data on this slot will be erased upon starting.#ec# Recommended only for #cr#seasoned players#ec#!
#cy#Are you SURE you want to release ^tag1^? You'll #ec##cr#never see them again...#ec#
#cc#What's this?!#ec# #cy#^tag1^ created a potion from its essence!#ec#
#cy#You must equip a weapon of type ^tag1^ in your main hand to use#ec# #cc#^tag2^#ec#.
#cy#You cannot use ^tag1^ without a Runic Crystal#ec#.
#cy#You must equip a melee weapon to use#ec# #cc#^tag1^#ec#.
#cy#You must equip a ranged weapon to use#ec# #cc#^tag1^#ec#.
You strike #cy#^tag1^#ec#, but it's #cr#not weakened enough#ec#!
You strike #cy#^tag1^#ec#, but it's #cr#too powerful to be knocked out#ec#!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# will now auto-equip when #cy#^tag2^#ec# is equipped!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# glows as the Dreamcaster #cy#dismantles a magical property#ec#!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# glows #cr#red-hot#ec# and disintegrates as the Dreamcaster #cc#extracts a magical property#ec#!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# has already been upgraded to its #cg#maximum potential#ec#.
#cy#^tag2^#ec# has a hard time aiming at #cy#^tag1^#ec# in the water!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# does not have any #cy#removable#ec# magical properties.
#cg#Tea Leaf#ec#: Restores 15 Stamina and Energy over time.
#cg#Citrus#ec#: Boosts attack and defense by 10% for 5 turns.
#cy#Caramel#ec#: Gain +4 CT per turn for 5 turns.
#cy#Green Apple#ec#: Increases dodge chance by 15% for 5 turns.
#cc#Basil#ec#: Heals 6% additional max HP over time.
You are #cr#too full#ec# to eat more!
Your corral is #cr#full#ec#; you can't knock out any more monsters!
Your corral is #cr#full#ec#; there's no room to put ^tag1^ back!
You can only have #cy#one monster corral pet#ec# out at a time.
You retrieve your friend #cy#^tag1^#ec# from the corral. It's ready for adventure!
You return your friend #cy#^tag1^#ec# to the corral, safe and sound.
This meal will help these monsters #cy#get along better#ec#!
This meal will help these monsters #cg#develop their friendship#ec#!
#cp#Something special#ec# could happen if these monsters share this meal!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# hatches from an egg in the corral!
The shovel #cy#shatters#ec# when thrust into solid bedrock!
Your #cy#healing flask#ec# is #cy#FULL#ec#. It #cr#can't hold any more#ec#!
Time passes as your adventure enters #cy#Day ^tag1^#ec#.
The #cy#^tag1^#ec# explodes into a #ca#shower of coins#ec#!
The #cy#Blessed Hammer#ec# is empowered with Wrath!
You #cy#plant the seed#ec# in the ground. Check back later!
The #cy#Vanishing#ec# equipment used by #cy#^tag1^#ec# warps them away!
May bestow a magical property when used in the Dreamcaster on equipment of type #ec##cc#^tag1^#ec##cy#:
May bestow a random magical property when used in the Dreamcaster.
May bestow a powerful magical property when used in the Dreamcaster.
An #cy#Orb of Reverie#ec# is required to use the #cy#Dreamcaster#ec#.
Damage based on Spirit and Discipline
Parry chance up; riposte after parrying On crit: Parry next attack
Deals extra damage based on HP lost recently; dual-wield bonus. On crit: Gain 5% max HP (vs non-Trivial enemies)
Hits all adjacent enemies On crit: Break defense
Damage based on Guile, Strength; Deals extra damage with consecutive hits on same target On crit: Gain 60 CT
Chance to stun your target On crit: Crush %HP damage
#cy#^tag2^#ec# days have passed since planted by #cc#^tag1^#ec#.
#cy#The game world has been rebuilt, but your hero and town progress have been preserved.#ec#
You stand on the stairway to ^tag1^.
Wrote a new recipe in your journal: ^tag1^!
Your intensified #cg#Song of Might#ec# grants you an #cy#extra attack#ec#!
Your intensified #cg#Song of Spirit#ec# heals you for #cg#^tag1^#ec# HP!
#cy#This floor of the dungeon has been revealed!#ec#
Your will to fight grows stronger, and #cy#ALL COOLDOWNS#ec# are reset!
You cannot sing the #cc#^tag1^#ec# when you #cr#don't have a Song active!#ec#
#cr#You cannot enter an item world when one is already open!#ec#
You give the banker #cy#^tag1^g#ec# (plus a #cy#200g#ec# fee.)
You need at least #cy#200g#ec# to cover the deposit fee!
#cy#Are you sure you want to sell all #ec#COMMON#cy# unequipped gear and valuables? This does NOT include consumables, favorited items, paired offhand gear, or hotkeyed weapons.
#cy#Are you sure you want to sell #ec##cc#ALL UNEQUIPPED GEAR#ec##cy# and valuables? This does NOT include consumables, favorited items, paired offhand gear, or hotkeyed weapons.
^tag1^ is #cr#overtaken by fear#ec#! It cannot #cy#dodge, block, or parry#ec#!
Transmute JP: ^tag1^ (^tag2^% Chance to Add Skill Mod)
Boss monster ^tag1^ and its minions have claimed #cy#^tag2^#ec#. You must defeat them!
^tag1^ is cleared of ALL negative status effects!
The #cy#Dream Crystal Aura#ec# is #cr#SEALING#ec# your abilities!
Select which #cy#game mode#ec# to play. This #cr#CANNOT be changed#ec# once the game has started!
#cy#Mir#ec# combines the red orb shards and hands you an #cr#Orb of Nightmares#ec#.
#cr#Nightmare Queen#ec#: 'You cannot escape... I smell your fear.'
#cr#Nightmare Queen#ec#: 'As your life wanes, I grow stronger.'
Your #cg#Floraconda#ec# crumbles into inanimate leaves. The #cg#cycle of nature#ec# replenishes you for #cy#^tag1^#ec# HP!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# is rescued by #cg#Jesse#ec# and brought back to the #cy#Corral#ec#!
View all of your #cg#healing food#ec# and #cc#potions#ec#.
You put #cc#^tag1^#ec# in the bank for a fee of ^tag2^!
You add #cc#^tag1^#ec# to the Food Cart. #cy#Check back tomorrow#ec# to collect profit!
Your staff #cy#absorbs Flow#ec#, and you gain #cy#^tag1^#ec# #cc#ENERGY#ec#!
You whistle to #cy#^tag1^#ec#, but it's too tired to jump to you!
Louder movement that may attract monsters.
Three #cc#Lucid Orb Shards#ec# in your inventory #cy#combine#ec# to create a #cc#^tag1^#ec#!
You shake off the #cy#stun#ec# with #cg#Steel Resolve#ec#!
You shrug off a #cr#CRITICAL HIT#ec# with #cg#Steel Resolve#ec#!
Disappears if you leave the Item Dream.
Clears negative status effects from monsters.
Monsters deal 25% more damage and take 25% less.
Abilities cost half as much Stamina / Energy.
You #cg#almost learn#ec# a #cy#Monster Skill#ec#. Maybe if you saw #cy#^tag1^#ec# #cg#again#ec#...
#cy#You prepare to parry the next attack!#ec#
#cy#^tag1^#ec# is stripped of the positive effect #cr#^tag2^#ec#!
Your mastery of #cg#potions#ec# has increased! All healing potions are #cy#25% more effective#ec#.
Your #cg#Healing Flask#ec# is infused with delicious apple! Its duration is #cy#extended by 1 turn#ec#.
You're #cr#not in an Item Dream#ec#, so you can't #cy#build planks#ec#.
#cr#You don't have a ranged weapon in your hotbar!#ec#
#cy#Its bizarre desires satisfied, ^tag1^ vanishes into thin air, taking a single ^tag2^ with it!#ec#
#cy#You can only use the#ec# #cg#^tag1^#ec##cy# in a town area.#ec#
You need #cy#cards#ec# in your #cy#hand#ec# to use #cc#^tag1^#ec#.
Your #cy#healing flask#ec# is #cr#empty#ec#! Step on a #cg#Fountain#ec# to refill it.
#cc#^tag1^#ec# is cooling down for another #cy#^tag2^#ec# turns.
^tag1^ is defeated! Gained #cc#^tag2^#ec# XP, #cg#^tag3^#ec# JP, and #cy#^tag4^#ec#g!
You #cy#try to move#ec#, but you're #cr#rooted in place#ec#!
You #cy#try to attack#ec#, but you #cr#can't use your weapon#ec#!
You need a #cy#^tag1^#ec# to open that.
As you fall unconscious, you lose #cy#^tag1^#ec#g, half #cg#unspent JP#ec#, and half #cc#XP progress#ec# toward the next level.
#cy#^tag1^#ec# was lost in Tangledeep, but perhaps a memory of you will live on.
You were defeated with #cr#^tag1^#ec# curative items in your backpack.
Don't forget to view the #cy#combat log#ec# for the circumstances of your adventure's end!
#cy#^tag1^#ec# was lost in Tangledeep, and never heard from again. Your journey has been #cr#forgotten#ec#.
You flip through the #cy#Dungeon Digest#ec# to learn more about this area.
A #cp#legendary item#ec# called ^tag1^ is in the possession of #cy#^tag2^#ec#.
#cy#Shara#ec# says, "The #cg#adaptive defenses#ec# of the Supervisor awaken within me!"
Fate determines that #cy#^tag1^#ec# will dodge your attack!
Select two #cy#feats#ec#. These are permanent bonuses!
#cc#PICK FOR ME:#ec# Get two feats at random!
#cr#DIFFICULTY UP:#ec# You may only have 9 stacks of a consumable
The air is fresh, the water shines blue.
Never could I have imagined such beauty awaited us here.
There's so much to explore. My adventure is just beginning!

#cc#FIRST TIME SETUP#ec#
Please select your preferred #cy#control style#ec#. (This can be changed and customized later.)
Controllers are auto-detected and usable!

#cg##big#CONGRATULATIONS!#endbig##ec#
Now that you have beaten the game, you can #cy#Continue#ec# your save slot to continue exploring Tangledeep. Your game is saved right before you reached the top.
You have also unlocked #cg#NEW GAME+#ec# mode for this slot! To use this, select #cy#New Game#ec# on your victorious save slot, and then confirm #cg#NEW GAME+#ec#.
You will keep all of your experience, skills, and items, but Tangledeep will be re-created with much harder challenges... and #cy#more treasure#ec#!

Would you like to begin a #cy#NEW GAME+#ec# save? Your existing character and meta progress #cg#will be saved#ec#, and you will start in a new world with #cr#much harder monsters#ec#... (#cg#and more rare treasure!#ec#)
Would you like to #cy#RESTART#ec# your NEW GAME+ world? Your existing character and meta progress #cg#will be saved#ec#, but the world will be #cg#completely reset#ec#.
All #cy#MONSTERS#ec# on this floor have #cc#FALLEN ASLEEP#ec#!
All #cy#MONSTERS#ec# on this floor now have #cr#1 Health#ec#!
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, gain Super Haste, and put all monsters on this floor to sleep!
Throw a card charged with powerful lightning at a random nearby enemy! Damage increases with hand size.
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, gain Super Haste, put all monsters on this floor to sleep and reduce them to 1 HP!
Gain "Super Haste", giving you lots of free turns!
Gain "Sharp Eyes", increasing crit chance for attacks and abilities.
Summon two pairs of Mini Panthox to fight on your behalf for 70 turns!
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, and Super Haste!
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, gain Super Haste, put all monsters on this floor to sleep and reduce them to 1 HP!
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, gain Super Haste, put all monsters on this floor to sleep and reduce them to 1 HP!
Heal to full, gain increased crit chance, gain Super Haste, put all monsters on this floor to sleep and reduce them to 1 HP!
You #cy#destroy the attack#ec# with your #cc#wrapped hand#ec#!
Your #cp#Armillary Mirrors#ec# shine, and you #cy#see through#ec# the illusion!
The #cy#^tag1^#ec# grows a thick #cg#layer of thorns#ec#!
The #cr#grim reaper#ec# comes for #cy#^tag1^#ec#, taking #cy#^tag2^#ec# Health!
#cy#You feel power surging through your body!#ec#
You feel #cc#tipsy#ec#, and move the wrong way...
#cy#Julia#ec# hands you several #cg#healing items#ec# for your jouney!
#cr#Death approaches#ec#, but you #cy#avoid its grasp#ec#! All negative statuses are #cg#removed#ec#!
Your ^tag1^ explodes, showering you in #cg#healing flames#ec#!
#cr#^tag1^ is enraged at the defeat of ^tag2^!#ec#
#cy#Are you sure you want to reset your keybindings to#ec# #co#^tag1^#ec##cy#? Your custom keybindings will be #ec##cr#overwritten#ec##cy#.#ec#.
#cr#Error saving game - please check output log!#ec#
#cy#^tag1^#ec# wanders out into the wild, never to be seen again.

Spend JP to purchase Active abilities. These are the tools you use to explore and survive in Tangledeep! Each job has unique active abilities, which you can combine to create a hero that matches your playstyle.

Support abilities increase your power and utility. They work passively, without a need to toggle them on or off. Each job has unique support abilities, and you can combine abilities from multiple jobs as you progress.
You can't use that without a #cg#monster pet#ec# from the #cy#corral#ec#!
Your pet #cc#^tag1^#ec# learns the monster ability #cy#^tag2^#ec#!
You can only equip #cy#one of those#ec# at a time!
Your attacks have #cr#no effect#ec# on anything but the #cy#^tag1^!#ec#
You harvest #cy#Stamina and Energy#ec# from the destroyed machine!
#cg#It's useless. My fighting style is invincible!#ec#
Your #cr#^tag1^#ec# strikes #cy#^tag2^#ec# for an extra #co#^tag3^#ec# damage!
You spend the night cooking some delicious #cy#^tag1^#ec#...
#cy#You have enough JP to learn an ability!#ec# #cg#(Press ^tag1^)#ec#
#cy#You have not yet unlocked this job!#ec#
#cy#BIG MODE!#ec# Every monster is now #cg#very big#ec#!
An #cc#echoing voice#ec# says, #cy#"Let's go for a ride!"#ec#
#cy#COSTUME PARTY!#ec# Every monster is wearing #cc#a random costume#ec#!
Since your last visit, your trees have produced #cy#^tag1^#ec# goods. Do you want to #cc#harvest all goods#ec# directly to your inventory?
With a mighty swing, the #cg#tree#ec# comes crashing down!
Your physical power, hardiness, and constitution.
Your dexterity, reflexes, and overall speed.
Your attunement to Flow and your own inner Qi.
Your mental fortitude, willpower, and focus.
Your ability to spot opportunities and act unpredictably.
Base damage dealt with attacks, as well as many abilities.
Base damage dealt by many abilities and status effects.
Chance to deal bonus damage with regular physical attacks. Depending on your weapon, crits may have a bonus effect.
Extra charge generated per turn. When you hit 100, you get a free turn where monsters don't move.
Base chance for monsters to drop a powerup. Decreases at range. Powerups instantly restore Energy or Stamina.
Increased damage dealt by ALL attacks, effects, and abilities. This stacks with individual element damage bonuses.
Your resistance to ALL damage, no matter the type or source. This stacks with individual element resists.
Your ability to withstand wounds taken in battle. Should it reach zero, your adventure will end.
Your ability to withstand wounds taken in battle. Should it reach zero, you will fall unconscious and be returned to Riverstone.
Your ability to withstand wounds taken in battle. Should it reach zero, your adventure and the campaign will end.
A resource used to power most physical and movement-based abilities. Restore it with food, potions, and powerups spawned in battle.
A resource used to power most elemental and magic abilities. Restore it with food, potions, and powerups spawned in battle.
Additional damage dealt when you score a critical hit. Abilities deal less crit damage than basic attacks.
The chance you will deflect a melee attack with your weapon, avoiding all damage. This chance is #cy#halved#ec# against #cc#ranged#ec# attacks.
The chance you will block an incoming attack. Blocking usually requires a shield.
The chance you will dodge an incoming attack, avoiding all damage.
Your ability to deal additional Physical#elementicon# damage, and resist incoming physical damage. Physical#elementicon# damage is usually dealt via weapons and a monster's claws or teeth.
Your attunement to Fire#elementicon# as defined by the amount of damage you resist and extra damage you deal. Fire#elementicon# damage is usually delivered via abilities or enchanted weapons.
Your attunement to Poison#elementicon# as defined by the amount of damage you resist and extra damage you deal. Poison#elementicon# damage is usually delivered via abilities or enchanted weapons.
Your attunement to Water#elementicon# as defined by the amount of damage you resist and extra damage you deal. Water#elementicon# damage is usually delivered via abilities or enchanted weapons.

Your attunement to Lightning#elementicon# as defined by the amount of damage you resist and extra damage you deal. Lightning#elementicon# damage is usually delivered via abilities or enchanted weapons.
Your attunement to Shadow#elementicon# as defined by the amount of damage you resist and extra damage you deal. Shadow#elementicon# damage is usually delivered via abilities or enchanted weapons.
The deepest floor that #heroname# has explored in Tangledeep.
The deepest floor ever explored by adventurers in your current campaign.
The number of in-game days that have passed since the start of the campaign. Most shops and the Orchard in Riverstone will update as the days pass.
The number of monsters #heroname# has defeated in battle.
The number of Champion monsters #heroname# has defeated in battle.
The number of steps #heroname# has taken on her adventures.
The job that #heroname# favors most based on your choices.
The total number of adventurers you have created in this campaign.
Total time played on this campaign.
The number of Pandora's Chests that #heroname# has opened. Each opened box increases the difficulty of monsters in Tangledeep!
